name: TxT (TheTUFGuy)
description:
A small project made based on tic tac toe. The rules to tic tac toe has been tweaked a little to see if any novelty can be resurged into the classic game.

The music and sound effects used are under Creative Commons License and were obtained from FREESOUND . 

   Play Instructions:

  • Drag and Drop pieces onto the grid
  • Bigger pieces can override smaller opponent  pieces and occupy their occupied cell.
  • Make 3 in a row/columns/diagonal to win.

In case you have issues running it in the browser, go ahead and download the windows version from below to play it on your desktop.

Future steps for this project might include but not limited to : 
- Building online 2 player support
- Find optimal playing strategies/ Implement heuristics/Modified Minimax?
- Code optimisations (efficient checking for win conditions
- Any suggested art/style improvements
